attributes.action: Ban The Dorechster Group Until Their Owners Accept Basic Human Rights
attributes.additional_details:
This month, the state owned Dorchester Group (Brunei) announced that it would bring into law, the full, and most severe form of Sharia Law there is. This includes, but not limited to, cutting the limbs off thieves; stoning to death those who commit "homosexual acts" or "adultery".

These are archaic ways of treating any human and no state owned group should be permitted to earn millions from the UK market while they implement such sick acts of punishment.

For the UK to be an advocate of Human Rights, they must demonstrate this by blocking any ownership of publically trading spaces (e.g. hotels) while Brunei continues with its anti-humane laws.

#ProtectTheHuman
